sentences.cn: “ 对不起,我打破了你的茶壶. ” “没关系. ”

sentences.en: He once plugged up the spout of a teapot and placed it on the fire.
sentences.cn: 曾有一次，他把茶壶嘴用东西堵住，然后把茶壶放在火炉上。

sentences.en: She refilled the teapot with boiling water.
sentences.cn: 她把茶壶又添满了开水.

sentences.en: She tried to prize the lid out of the teapot.
sentences.cn: 她试图启开茶壶的盖子.

sentences.en: She upped and threw the teapot at him.
sentences.cn: 她跳起来，将茶壶向他掷去。

sentences.en: Sounds interesting.I just want to buy a teapot.
sentences.cn: 听起来蛮有趣的。我刚好想买个茶壶。

sentences.en: The boy broke the teapot. How annoying!
sentences.cn: 这男孩把茶壶打破了, 真可气!

sentences.en: The broken spout on that teapot should be mended.
sentences.cn: 要把那只茶壶的破壶嘴修好.

sentences.en: The handle of this teapot has an awkward shape.
sentences.cn: 这茶壶把儿的形状真别扭.

sentences.en: The teapot dropped out of her hand.
sentences.cn: 茶壶从她手中掉了下来.

sentences.en: The teapot fell with an awful smash.
The teapot looked old but was a recent fake.
sentences.cn: 这把茶壶貌似古董,却是一件新近制作的赝品.

sentences.en: They were trying to put the dormouse into the teapot.
sentences.cn: 他们正打算把睡鼠塞到茶壶里去.

sentences.en: This kind of teapot is very expensive.
When she dropped the teapot it broke.
sentences.cn: 她把茶壶掉在地上打破了.
